title: Ceremonial Warhammer
content:
Ceremonial Warhammer Uncommon 2~11 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d10 (1d8)+1 Bludgeoning Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Following tradition, this hammer's faces were forged with grooves that sealed in the blood of its first kill.
